segments.text: What kind of person do you think you are ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am always energetic and enthusiastic . That's my strongest personality .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are your strengths and weaknesses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Em , as I have said , I'm diligent and industrious . On the other hand , sometimes I'm too hard-working and I put myself under too much pressure to make things perfect .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What qualities would you expect of persons working as a team ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To work in a team , in my opinion , two characteristics are necessary for a person . That is , the person must be cooperative and aggressive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you spend your leisure time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like playing games and having sports . They are my favourite hobbies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what kind of sport do you like most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's hard to narrow it down to just one . I mean , I like all kinds of sports , basketball , swimming , bike riding and so on . Maybe it is just the reason why I am so energetic and vigorous .
segments.speaker: S2
